snippet: Liverpool had to combat "wild football" from Everton before a last-gasp winner from Sadio Mane earned the visitors a 1-0 derby win at Goodison Park on Monday, said manager Juergen Klopp....

headline.main: Liverpool Had to Thwart Wild Everton Football, Says Klopp
headline.print_headline: Liverpool Had to Thwart Wild Everton Football, Says Klopp

lead_paragraph: Liverpool had to combat "wild football" from Everton before a last-gasp winner from Sadio Mane earned the visitors a 1-0 derby win at Goodison Park on Monday, said manager Juergen Klopp.

snippet: The Football Association has charged Burnley striker Andre Gray with misconduct over comments he made on social media in 2012....

headline.main: Burnley's Gray Charged by FA Over Social Media Comments
headline.print_headline: Burnley's Gray Charged by FA Over Social Media Comments

lead_paragraph: The Football Association has charged Burnley striker Andre Gray with misconduct over comments he made on social media in 2012.

snippet: Australia international left back Brad Smith has joined Bournemouth from Liverpool on a four-year contract, the Premier League clubs said on Wednesday....

headline.main: Full-Back Brad Smith Joins Bournemouth From Liverpool
headline.print_headline: Full-Back Brad Smith Joins Bournemouth From Liverpool

lead_paragraph: Australia international left back Brad Smith has joined Bournemouth from Liverpool on a four-year contract, the Premier League clubs said on Wednesday.

snippet: Scotland striker Steven Fletcher will play for Olympique Marseille for the rest of the season after moving on loan from Premier League strugglers Sunderland on Monday....

headline.main: Marseille Sign Scotland Striker Fletcher on Loan
headline.print_headline: Marseille Sign Scotland Striker Fletcher on Loan

lead_paragraph: Scotland striker Steven Fletcher will play for Olympique Marseille for the rest of the season after moving on loan from Premier League strugglers Sunderland on Monday.

snippet: Manchester United manager Jose Mourinho has been charged with improper conduct by the FA after he was sent off at the weekend for the second time in a month....

headline.main: United Manager Mourinho Charged Again by FA
headline.print_headline: United Manager Mourinho Charged Again by FA

lead_paragraph: Manchester United manager Jose Mourinho has been charged with improper conduct by the FA after he was sent off at the weekend for the second time in a month.

snippet: Burnley have signed Chelsea forward Patrick Bamford on a season-long loan, the Premier League club said on Tuesday....

headline.main: Burnley Sign Chelsea Striker Bamford on Season-Long Loan
headline.print_headline: Burnley Sign Chelsea Striker Bamford on Season-Long Loan

lead_paragraph: Burnley have signed Chelsea forward Patrick Bamford on a season-long loan, the Premier League club said on Tuesday.

snippet: Manchester United defender Guillermo Varela has joined German side Eintracht Frankfurt on a season-long loan, the Premier League club said on Saturday....

headline.main: United Defender Varela Joins Frankfurt on Season-Long Loan
headline.print_headline: United Defender Varela Joins Frankfurt on Season-Long Loan

lead_paragraph: Manchester United defender Guillermo Varela has joined German side Eintracht Frankfurt on a season-long loan, the Premier League club said on Saturday.

snippet: Touré, 32, joined City, a Premier League club, from Barcelona for $34.2 million in 2010 but has not been offered a new contract, his agent said....

headline.main: Yaya Touré Plans to Leave Manchester City

lead_paragraph: Touré, 32, joined City, a Premier League club, from Barcelona for $34.2 million in 2010 but has not been offered a new contract, his agent said.

snippet: Newcastle United finally put manager Steve McClaren out of his misery when they sacked him on Friday after a period of intense speculation surrounding his future....

headline.main: Newcastle Call Time on McClaren's Unhappy Reign
headline.print_headline: Newcastle Call Time on McClaren's Unhappy Reign

lead_paragraph: Newcastle United finally put manager Steve McClaren out of his misery when they sacked him on Friday after a period of intense speculation surrounding his future.

snippet: - Ashley Williams powered home a towering header in the 86th minute as Everton fought back to claim a 2-1 win over Arsenal as the title hopefuls blew the chance to return to the Premier League summit on Tuesday....

headline.main: Williams Lifts Everton as Arsenal Blow Chance
headline.print_headline: Williams Lifts Everton as Arsenal Blow Chance

lead_paragraph: - Ashley Williams powered home a towering header in the 86th minute as Everton fought back to claim a 2-1 win over Arsenal as the title hopefuls blew the chance to return to the Premier League summit on Tuesday.
